title-part.text: HANDLING OF COINS OR OF PAPER CURRENCY OR SIMILAR VALUABLE PAPERS, e.g. TESTING, SORTING BY DENOMINATIONS, COUNTING, DISPENSING, CHANGING OR DEPOSITING

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated: "coins" also covers tokens of similar nature; "paper currency or similar valuable papers" covers banknotes, bills, cheques, vouchers, securities, bonds or the like.

This suclass covers handling of "coins" or "paper currency" insofar as they carry distinctive value features representative of money or the like.
Informative references:sorting in general B07Chandling paper sheets in general B65Hcounting by weighing G01Gcounting of objects in general, i.e. without discriminating of denominations, G06M

The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
G07D13/00 covered by G07D11/00 and subgroup.

title-part.text: dispensing change equal to a sum deposited
dispensing the difference between a sum paid and a sum charged
Sorting a mixed bulk of coins into denominations

reference.text: sorting paper currency G07D11/0084; sorting by coin weight G01G

title-part.text: Sorting coins by means of graded apertures
provided by sieves arranged in series
Sorting coins by means of stepped deflectors

CPC-specific-text.text: the coins being deflected off rails
the coins being diverted by ramps in channels

title-part.text: Apparatus driven under control of coin-sensing elements
Testing specially adapted to determine the identity or genuineness of coins, e.g. for segregating coins which are unacceptable or alien to a currency

reference.text: in combination with apparatus freed or actuated by coins or the like G07F3/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Testing the surface pattern, e.g. relief

title-part.text: Testing the dimensions, e.g. thickness, diameter
Testing the magnetic or electric properties
Testing the rim, e.g. the milling of the rim
Testing specially adapted to determine the identity or genuineness of paper currency or similar valuable papers or for segregating those which are alien to a currency or otherwise unacceptable

note.note-paragraph: In this group, groups G07D7/16 - G07D7/20 take precedence over groups G07D7/02 - G07D7/14.

Group G07D7/00 is impacted by reclassification into group G07D7/15.
Groups G07D7/00 and G07D7/15 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: using digital security elements, e.g. information coded on a magnetic thread or strip

note.note-paragraph:
Groups G07D7/004 – G07D7/0043 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G07D7/20.
Groups G07D7/004, G07D7/0043 and G07D7/20 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: using checkcodes, e.g. coded numbers derived from serial number and denomination
Testing security markings invisible to the naked eye, e.g. verifying thickened lines or unobtrusive markings or alterations

note.note-paragraph:
Groups G07D7/005 – G07D7/0057 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G07D7/20.
Groups G07D7/005 – G07D7/0057 and G07D7/20 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: involving markings removed from an original pattern
involving markings added to a pattern, e.g. interstitial points
involving markings the properties of which are altered from original properties
involving markings displaced slightly from original positions within a pattern
involving markings which are altered in dimension, e.g. thickened lines

note.note-paragraph:
Group G07D7/01 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G07D7/02 and G07D7/04.
Groups G07D7/01, G07D7/02 and G07D7/04 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Testing electrical properties of the materials thereof

note.note-paragraph:
Group G07D7/02 is impacted by reclassification into group G07D7/01.
Groups G07D7/02 and G07D7/01 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Testing magnetic properties of the materials thereof, e.g. by detection of magnetic imprint

note.note-paragraph:
Group G07D7/04 is impacted by reclassification into group G07D7/01.
Groups G07D7/04 and G07D7/01 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Visible light, infra-red or ultraviolet radiation

note.note-paragraph:
Group G07D7/12 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G07D7/121.
Groups G07D7/12 and G07D7/121 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G07D7/121 is impacted by reclassification into group G07D7/12.
Groups G07D7/121 and G07D7/12 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G07D7/15 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G07D7/00.
Groups G07D7/00 and G07D7/15 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Apparatus characterised by positioning means or by means responsive to positioning
Testing mechanical properties or condition, e.g. wear or tear

note.note-paragraph:
Group G07D7/181 is impacted by reclassification into group G07D7/189.
Groups G07D7/181 and G07D7/189 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Detecting defacement or contamination, e.g. dirt
Detecting attached objects, e.g. tapes or clips

note.note-paragraph:
Group G07D7/189 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G07D7/181.
Groups G07D7/181 and G07D7/189 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G07D7/20 is impacted by reclassification into groups G07D7/004 – G07D7/005.
Groups G07D7/20 and G07D7/004 – G07D7/005 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: using pre-processing, e.g. de-blurring, averaging, normalisation or rotation
using feature extraction, e.g. segmentation, edge detection or Hough-transformation

title-part.text: Matching unique patterns, i.e. patterns that are unique to each individual paper

CPC-specific-text.text: Matching statistical distributions, e.g. of particle sizes orientations

title-part.text: Matching patterns that are created by the interaction of two or more layers, e.g. moiré patterns
Handling of coins not provided for in the other groups of this subclass

title-part.text: Hand- or motor-driven devices for counting coins
Devices for stacking or otherwise arranging coins on a support, e.g. apertured plate for use in counting coins

reference.text: apparatus freed or actuated by coins or the like G07F; apparatus freed or actuated by paper currency G07F7/04; complete banking systems G07F19/00;

CPC-specific-text.text: arrangements actuated by a coded-card for receiving or dispensing monies or the like and posting such transactions to existing accounts, e.g. automatic teller machines [ATMs] G07F19/20

note.note-paragraph: This group covers constructional or functioning aspects of devices handling paper currency, including of so-called Automatic Teller Machines [ATMs]; other aspects of ATMs, e.g. posting transactions to existing accounts or aspects related to the interaction with users, are covered by group G07F19/20
Informative reference:
- devices dispensing coins G07D1/00

for checking and indicating machine condition, fault detection

reference.text: registering or indicating the working of machines in general G07C3/00

for servicing, repairing or coping with irregularities, e.g. power failure, vandalism
for tracking or tracing banknotes or cassettes

reference.text: indicating machine condition G07D11/0048; transaction aspects G07F19/00

for transmitting data, e.g. software updates, parameter settings

CPC-specific-text.text: Accepting paper currency or other valuables in containers, e.g. in code-marked envelopes

title-part.text: Handling of coins or of paper currency or similar valuable papers, characterised by a combination of mechanisms not covered by a single one of groups G07D1/00-G07D11/00
by downloading test parameters, e.g. remotely
